name: OSUMSmartLivingHomeAutomation
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, set fan to 20 percent”
”Alexa, set background color to orange”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is used to Control, Configure and Status Reporting for SL-BUS Technology products. There are range of products available from SL-BUS alliance members, for more details please visit http://smartliving.net.in or http://osum.in
Once you have products installed at your end, you will need a VADACTRO Cloud Login Credentials to access these devices from alexa. For more details email us at contactus@vadactro.org.in
